name: part_006
file: tmp_【生誕祭】百鬼あやめ 4th Birth Dayライブ!!!!!!!!!!! 　＃百鬼あやめ4th生誕祭 [bn7OaRnM9-A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Yumemiru Sora e'.
MC section where the guests congratulate Ayame on her birthday and discuss their dance practice.
MC section where Noel introduces a 'Santa' guest (Marine in a beard) for Ayame.
Short singing performance of 'We Wish You a Merry Christmas'.
scenes.song_name: We Wish You a Merry Christmas

scenes.description: Intro for the next song performance.

subtitles.original: 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: To the Dreaming Sky

subtitles.original: 笑い合ったことや
subtitles.english: The things we laughed about

subtitles.original: 尽きそうにない話題
subtitles.english: and the topics that never seemed to end,

subtitles.original: 思い出いっぱいなのに
subtitles.english: even though they're full of memories,

subtitles.original: あっという間の日々
subtitles.english: the days went by in a flash.

subtitles.original: 上書きじゃなくて
subtitles.english: Not overwriting them,

subtitles.original: 名前付けて保存
subtitles.english: but saving them with names.

subtitles.original: どれも全部大切に生きてゆける
subtitles.english: I can live while cherishing every single one of them.

subtitles.original: One for All
subtitles.english: One for All

subtitles.original: みんなのための力になる
subtitles.english: Becoming a strength for everyone.

subtitles.original: All for One
subtitles.english: All for One

subtitles.original: 今日も賑やかすぎるくらい
subtitles.english: It's almost too lively again today.

subtitles.original: 笑顔が止まらない
subtitles.english: The smiles just won't stop.

subtitles.original: 思いは膨らんでゆく
subtitles.english: The feelings keep growing.

subtitles.original: 重ねた今 ギュッと噛み締めた
subtitles.english: I savored this moment we've layered together.

subtitles.original: ひとりひとり違う声で
subtitles.english: Each and every person with a different voice,

subtitles.original: 歌声が広がる
subtitles.english: The singing voices spread out.

subtitles.original: 風を感じたら まっすぐに行くよ
subtitles.english: Once I feel the breeze, I'll go straight ahead.

subtitles.original: 行こう 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go towards the dreaming sky.

subtitles.original: 憧れて 手を伸ばし
subtitles.english: Yearning for it, reaching out my hand,

subtitles.original: 掴みとった その光が
subtitles.english: that light I finally grasped...

subtitles.original: いつの日か また誰かの
subtitles.english: will one day, for someone else again,

subtitles.original: 憧れに変わる
subtitles.english: turn into a yearning.

subtitles.original: 繋げよう
subtitles.english: Let's pass it on.

subtitles.original: 重ねた手は ギュッと離さずに
subtitles.english: Holding our joined hands tightly, without letting go,

subtitles.original: ひとりひとり違う色で 描き出すトキメキ
subtitles.english: Each and every person with a different color, painting this excitement.

subtitles.original: 出会えた全てに ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for everything I've encountered.

subtitles.original: 奇跡だって 起こし続け ずっと ずっと そばにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'll keep making miracles happen, and stay by your side forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 行こう 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go towards the dreaming sky.

subtitles.original: あやめ先輩！
subtitles.english: Ayame-senpai!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday to you!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございまーす！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: あやめ先輩 何歳になったんですか？
subtitles.english: Ayame-senpai, how old are you now?

subtitles.original: 余は、えーっと、1500...4、5歳ぐらいになりました！
subtitles.english: I've turned, uh, around 1500... 4 or 5 years old!

subtitles.original: おばあ...
subtitles.english: Grandma...

subtitles.original: ギスギスしないの！
subtitles.english: Don't be mean!

subtitles.original: いやでもダンス頑張ったね。
subtitles.english: But you really worked hard on the dance.

subtitles.original: ねえ。みんなで揃えてね。こうやって「夢見る空へ」って。
subtitles.english: Right. We all aligned, didn't we? Doing "Yumemiru Sora e" like this.

subtitles.original: なんかこれ、あれなんだよね。マリンと余はBloomで。
subtitles.english: This was, you know... Marine and I were in Bloom.

subtitles.original: そうそう。Bloom。踊ってました、見てました。
subtitles.english: Right, right. Bloom. We danced it, we saw it.

subtitles.original: 団長だけやったことなくて、ちょっと、んー、心配だったんだけど。
subtitles.english: Only Danchou hadn't done it before, so I was a bit... hmmm, worried.

subtitles.original: なんと！今回この二人が先生になってくれて、教えてくれたんですよ。
subtitles.english: But wait! These two became my teachers this time and taught me.

subtitles.original: はい、うぃんうぃんいきますよ！
subtitles.english: Yes, win-win, here we go!

subtitles.original: はい！高速ステップいきますよ！
subtitles.english: Yes! Fast steps, here we go!

subtitles.original: ちなみにここ3回ぐらい間違えました。
subtitles.english: By the way, I messed up here about 3 times.

subtitles.original: 間違えましたね。でも何度も撮り直しましたけど。無事に形になりました！
subtitles.english: You did. But we re-shot it many times. And it safely took shape!

subtitles.original: よかったし、あとここがピタッと。きれいだったよね、最後。
subtitles.english: It was good, and also this part was perfectly in sync. It was beautiful, right? The end.

subtitles.original: ねえ。どうでしたか皆さん？
subtitles.english: Yeah. How was it, everyone?

subtitles.original: いっぱいスクショして、ハッシュタグで呟くんだぞ、お前ら！
subtitles.english: Take lots of screenshots and tweet them with the hashtag, you lot!

subtitles.original: いやー。そう、あやめ先輩誕生日ということで。
subtitles.english: Wow. So, since it's Ayame-senpai's birthday...

subtitles.original: ちょっと誕生日プレゼントじゃないんですけど。
subtitles.english: It's not exactly a birthday present, but...

subtitles.original: 団長やっぱあやめ先輩、今回こうダンスとか教えてくれたりとか、あとお呼ばれしてくださったんで。
subtitles.english: Since Ayame-senpai taught me the dance and invited me here...

subtitles.original: え、ちなみに、あやめ先輩、サンタさんは信じてますか？
subtitles.english: By the way, Ayame-senpai, do you believe in Santa Claus?

subtitles.original: そりゃサンタさんいるよ！
subtitles.english: Of course there's a Santa Claus!

subtitles.original: そうですよね。団長、あやめ先輩のために。
subtitles.english: I thought so. Danchou has, for Ayame-senpai...

subtitles.original: なんと、サンタさんを呼んできました！
subtitles.english: Guess what, I've brought Santa Claus!

subtitles.original: ホッホッホ。メリークリスマス！
subtitles.english: Ho ho ho. Merry Christmas!

subtitles.original: あやめちゃん、メリークリスマス。サンタさんじゃよ。ホッホッホ。
subtitles.english: Ayame-chan, Merry Christmas. It's Santa Claus. Ho ho ho.

subtitles.original: 誰だ？
subtitles.english: Who's that?

subtitles.original: サンタさん、サンタさんです。
subtitles.english: It's Santa, Santa Claus.

subtitles.original: あやめちゃん、サンタじゃよ。よしよし、いい子いい子。
subtitles.english: Ayame-chan, it's Santa. There, there, good girl, good girl.

subtitles.original: 怖い、怖い、やだー！
subtitles.english: Scary, scary, nooo!

subtitles.original: We wish you a Merry Christmas... (Singing)
subtitles.english: We wish you a Merry Christmas... (Singing)

subtitles.original: adrenaline!!!
subtitles.english: adrenaline!!!
